question.title: What is a common triggering circumstance for syncope in adults?

option_b.title: Vasovagal syncope
option_b.description: A common type of fainting spell caused by a nervous system response

option_c.title: Prolonged standing or sitting
option_c.description: Prolonged periods of inactivity can lead to decreased blood flow and low blood pressure
